p.span: Uses the value of the "search" field in a context to automatically update the context using field, context, classList, container and scope parameters.

Updates the context 'count_by_dest_port_1d' by class, in the container 'network_traffic', based upon the data in the field 'count". Uses the contents of the field 'dest_port' to define the context classes. This allows individual contexts for each network port.
